description: Add aggressive and explicit logging at all levels (ERROR, WARN, INFO, DEBUG, TRACE) throughout the LessPass/Cloudflare project
context: Added TRACE, DEBUG, INFO logging to index.js covering entry point, request validation, URL parsing, config initialization, and routing
Added TRACE, DEBUG logging to config.js covering initialization, validation, and source tracking
Added TRACE, DEBUG, WARN logging to utils.js covering stream initialization, WebSocket operations, base64 decoding, and UUID operations
